LABEL.NO_ALTERNATE_CONTACT: I don't have an alternate contact
LABEL.APPLICANT_PREFERENCES_HOUSEHOLD_MEMBER: Which household member has this preference?
LABEL.APPLICANT_NO_PHONE: I don't have a telephone number
LABEL.APPLICANT_ADDITIONAL_PHONE: I have an additional phone number
LABEL.APPLICANT_NO_EMAIL: I don't have an email address
LABEL.APPLICANT_SEPARATE_ADDRESS: I have a separate mailing address
LABEL.WORK_IN_SF: Do you work in San Francisco?
LABEL.WHAT_TYPE_OF_NUMBER: What type of number is this?
LABEL.ALTERNATE_CONTACT_AGENCY: What agency does your social worker or counselor work at?
LABEL.OTHER_PEOPLE: Other people will live with me
LABEL.MEMBER_WORK_IN_SF: Do they work in San Francisco?
LABEL.HOUSEHOLD_MEMBER_RELATIONSHIP: What is your relationship to them?
LABEL.APPLICANT_INCOME_TOTAL: What is your household total pre-tax income?
LABEL.INCOME_PLACEHOLDER: Total all of your income sources
LABEL.HOW_DID_YOU_HEAR_ABOUT_THIS: How did you hear about this listing?
LABEL.NAME: Name

A1_INTRO.TITLE: Let's get started on your application for

A2_OVERVIEW.TITLE: Here's what to expect for this application.
A2_OVERVIEW.P1: First we'll ask about you and the people you live with.
A2_OVERVIEW.P2: Then we'll talk about your household's status and income.
A2_OVERVIEW.P3: You'll get a chance to review before you submit your application.
A2_OVERVIEW.WARNING: Warning: Only apply once per lottery, duplicate applications will be disqualified.

B1_NAME.TITLE: We'll get started by getting some information about you. First, what's your name?

ERROR.DOB: Please enter a valid Date of Birth
ERROR.PHONE_NUMBER_TYPE: Please select a phone number type
ERROR.HOUSEHOLD_MEMBER_RELATIONSHIP: Please select your relationship to the household member
ERROR.TERMS: You must agree to the terms in order to continue

B2_CONTACT.TITLE: Thanks{{name}}. Now we need to know how to contact you about your application.
B2_CONTACT.ALTERNATE_PHONE_REQUIRED: We'll require an alternate contact phone number on a later screen
B2_CONTACT.ONLY_USE_YOUR_EMAIL: We will only use your email address to contact you about your application.
B2_CONTACT.REQUIRE_ALTERNATE_EMAIL: We'll require an alternate contact email adddress on a later screen
B2_CONTACT.REQUIRE_ALTERNATE_ADDRESS: We'll require an alternate mailing address on a later screen
B2_CONTACT.PROVIDE_AN_ADDRESS: Provide an address where you can receive updates and materials about your application.
B2_CONTACT.WORK_IN_SF_DESC: This means you work in San Francisco at least 75% of your working hours.

B3_ALTERNATE_CONTACT_TYPE.TITLE: Is there someone else you'd like us to contact if we can't get ahold of you?

B4_ALTERNATE_CONTACT_NAME.TITLE: Who is your alternate contact?
B4_ALTERNATE_CONTACT_NAME.P1: A good alternate contact is a person who will know how to reach you.

B4A_ALTERNATE_CONTACT_PHONE_ADDRESS.TITLE: Let us know how to reach your alternate contact.
B4A_ALTERNATE_CONTACT_PHONE_ADDRESS.ONLY_USE_EMAIL: We will only use this email address to contact your contact about your application.
B4A_ALTERNATE_CONTACT_PHONE_ADDRESS.CHOOSE_AN_ADDRESS: Choose an address where they can receive updates and materials about your application.

C1_HOUSEHOLD_INTRO.TITLE: Next, we'll get some info about any people who would live with you in the unit.

C1A_HOUSEHOLD_OVERVIEW.TITLE1: Before adding other people, confirm that they have not applied in another application.
C1A_HOUSEHOLD_OVERVIEW.TITLE2: If you include someone who has already applied, all of your applications will be disqualified.

C3_HOUSEHOLD_MEMBER_FORM.TITLE: Tell us about this person
C3_HOUSEHOLD_MEMBER_FORM.P1: You'll have the opportunity to add more household members on the next screen.
C3_HOUSEHOLD_MEMBER_FORM.WORK_IN_SF_DESC: This means they work in San Francisco at least 75% of their working hours.

D1_STATUS_PROGRAMS.TITLE: There are some special programs we'd like to ask you about. Do you have any of the following?
D1_STATUS_PROGRAMS.DISPLACED_TENANTS_DESC: Primarily households displaced by Ellis Act evictions as defined by The Ellis Act Displacement Emergency Assistance Ordinance passed into law on December 18, 2013. (Formerly Ellis Act Preference)
D1_STATUS_PROGRAMS.CERT_OF_PREFERENCE_DESC: Primarily households displaced by Agency action in Redevelopment Project Areas during the 1960's and 1970's, but may also include other persons displaced by Agency action.
D1_STATUS_PROGRAMS.PLEASE_CALL_P1: If you have not heard of these preferences, you most likely do not have one. Please
D1_STATUS_PROGRAMS.PLEASE_CALL_P2: to see if you have a Certificate.

D6_STATUS_VOUCHERS.TITLE: Does anyone in your household receive any housing vouchers or subsidies?
D6_STATUS_VOUCHERS.P1: For example: Section 8, VASH, HSA, HOPWA, Catholic Charities, AIDS Foundation, etc.

E1_INCOME.TITLE: Let's move onto the final topic: income.
E1_INCOME.P1: Add up your total gross (pre-tax) household income from wages, benefits and other sources from all household members.
E1_INCOME.P2: You only need to provide an estimated total right now. Precise totals will be calculated, if you are selected in the lottery.

F0_REVIEW_OPTIONAL.TITLE: These questions are optional and won't affect your eligibility for housing.
F0_REVIEW_OPTIONAL.P1: Your responses will help us ensure we're meeting our goal to serve all people. Your answers will be kept private.

F1_REVIEW_SUMMARY.TITLE: Take a moment to review your information before submitting your application.

F2_REVIEW_TERMS.TITLE: Terms
F2_REVIEW_TERMS.P1: This application must be physically received (by mail or in person) by the listing due date. Please see the San Francisco Housing Portal website (housing.sfgov.org) for deadlines and location to submit the application.
F2_REVIEW_TERMS.P2: Applicants will be contacted by the leasing agent in lottery rank and preference order until vacancies are filled.
F2_REVIEW_TERMS.P3: All of the information that you have provided will be verified and your eligibility confirmed. Any fraudulent statements will cause your application to be removed from the lottery. You will also be removed from the lottery if we cannot verify your housing lottery preference, or if a household member appears on more than one application for this listing.
F2_REVIEW_TERMS.P4: Should your application be chosen from the lottery, be prepared to fill out a more detailed application and provide required supporting documents. For more information, please contact the property directly using the contact information posted in the property announcement.
F2_REVIEW_TERMS.P5: I declare that the foregoing is true and accurate, and I acknowledge that any material misstatement fraudulently or negligently made on this application will result in removal from the lottery.
